actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require each contract let without competitive bidding by the Federal Government to contain a notice of the right to revoke on the part of the United States, if the other party to the contract is convicted of any offense under section 201 of title 18 of the United States Code.

summary.text: Requires each contract let without competitive bidding by the Federal Government to contain a notice of the right to revoke on the part of the United States, if the other party to the contract is convicted of any offense relating to bribery of public officials.

titles.title: A bill to require each contract let without competitive bidding by the Federal Government to contain a notice of the right to revoke on the part of the United States, if the other party to the contract is convicted of any offense under section 201 of title 18 of the United States Code.
